articles.title: Kim Jong Un Awarded Title of Marshal of DPRK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Awarded Title of Marshal of DPRK 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A decision was made to award the title of Marshal of the DPRK to Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army. 
					 The decision was jointly issued on Tuesday by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Servicepersons Vow to Be Faithful to Leadership of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Servicepersons Vow to Be Faithful to Leadership of Kim Jong Un   
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Officers and men of the Korean People's Army met at the April 25 House of Culture Wednesday to extend the highest glory and congratulations to KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un on his holding of the title of the DPRK Marshal, and vow to uphold his leadership with loyalty. 
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Hyon Yong Chol, chief of the KPA General Staff, Kim Jong Gak, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Hyon Chol Hae, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and other leading officials of the ministry and KPA officers and men.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae read out a decision of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission and the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on awarding the title of the DPRK Marshal to Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The participants broke into thunderous cheers in excitement.
					
					 Then the floor was taken by speakers.
					
					 Hyon Yong Chol, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, offered the highest glory and the warmest congratulations to the respected supreme commander in reflection of the warm respect and ardent loyalty of all the servicepersons.
					
					 He said that the title awarded to Kim Jong Un is a manifestation of the boundless respect of the army and people for the great illustrious commander of Songun and an event of great significance that displayed their firm will to trust only the supreme commander and follow him.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who learned about military affairs in his early years under the care of leader Kim Jong Il, has developed the KPA into an elite revolutionary army, regarding it as his lifelong mission to accomplish the Songun revolutionary cause of Juche, thus making special contributions to demonstrating the might of the country as a world-level military power, he said.
					
					 Hyon noted that Kim Jong Un is the best, invincible and iron-willed commander who develops the People's Army and fully demonstrates the dignity and might of the country with infinite loyalty to the great Generalissimos and rare commanding art.
					
					 He said that it is the supreme mission, duty and noble obligation of the servicepersons to reunify the country and achieve the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, closely united around Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is perfectly possessed on the highest level of the disposition and personality as a modern strategist and statesman, Kim Jong Gak said. 
					
					 He has further developed and enriched the Juche-oriented military ideas, strategies and tactics of the great Generalissimos as required by the era, determined to carry to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, he noted, adding that a fresh heyday is being opened in the development of the People's Army thanks to the energetic leadership of the supreme commander.
					
					 The KPA service personnel through their life experience enshrined the absolute truth that only victory and glory will be in store for the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu which advances under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he said, and went on:
					
					 We will firmly prepare ourselves to be revolutionary comrades-in-arms who would follow him step by step with pure conscience.
					
					 We will make ceaseless innovations in the construction of major projects for building a thriving nation and improving the standard of people's living and take the lead in implementing the WPK's intention to provide the people with a happy life under socialism, bearing in mind Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 Pak Jae Gyong said that the army and people of the DPRK are speeding up their advance for a final victory after overcoming the sorrow over the great loss to the nation, adding that it is entirely thanks to the supreme commander who is the best in idea, leadership and virtue.
					
					 Saying that it was the ardent wish of all the army and people to award the highest title to the supreme commander, he noted that the army and people are so much excited with joy now as they have realized their wish.
					
					 The KPA will demonstrate its might as a strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu in the general offensive towards a final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he stressed.
					
					 A resolution was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Servicepersons Held to Congratulate Marshal Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Servicepersons Held to Congratulate Marshal Kim Jong Un 
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of servicepersons of the Korean People's Army took place in the plaza of the April 25 House of Culture here on July 18 to offer their highest glory and congratulations to Marshal of the DPRK Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA.
					 It began with the playing of song Glory to Our Great Party. They danced to the tune of such songs as, Happiness of Being under the Care of Respected Supreme Commander, the Song of the Korean People's Army, the Twelve Months of Victory of Songun and the Country I Am Defending. 
					
					 They represented the great joy and deep emotion as well as boundless trust in the supreme commander.
					
					 Pervading the dancing venue were pride of the soldiers of having the peerlessly great man at the top post of the revolutionary armed forces, a man who contributed to the strengthening and developing of the armed forces by steadily developing in depth the Juche-oriented military idea, strategy and tactics and Juche-based war methods of great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Firmly Pledging to fulfill the noble mission and duty as the strong army of the leader and the party, the army of the supreme commander, by further developing the invincible revolutionary armed forces, the service members danced to the tune of songs including We Will Devotedly Defend General Kim Jong Un, Footsteps and Let's Meet Each Other on the Front.

articles.title: Servicepersons Vow Loyalty to Marshal Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Servicepersons Vow Loyalty to Marshal Kim Jong Un
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- It was announced at noon on Wednesday that Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, was awarded the title of Marshal of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 This news has delighted all people across the country, especially the servicepersons.
					
					 Choe Hak Min, a general officer of the KPA, told KCNA:
					
					 "All officers and men of our unit are now offering their highest glory to Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The conferment is an expression of the servicepersons and civilians' admiration for the great feats he has performed by always leading the KPA to victory with treasured sword of Songun (military-first).
					
					 We, servicepersons, will prepare ourselves to be a dependable vanguard of the Songun revolution guaranteeing the cause of the Workers' Party of Korea with arms, under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Nam Kil, an officer of the KPA, said:
					
					 "Marshal Kim Jong Un is an illustrious Songun commander of Mt. Paektu who is creditably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Songun pioneered and led by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This cause of Juche will be further accelerated by the strong army guided by him."
					
					 A soldier, Han Sun Nyo, stressed that the KPA, led by Marshal Kim Jong Un with rare wisdom and matchless gut, would always emerge victorious in showdown with the imperialists. Through intensive military training, I will prepare myself to be a stalwart combatant ready to defeat any formidable enemy at one stroke and a member of the death-defying corps for national reunification, she said.

articles.title: DPRK People Joyful at Important News
articles.content:
DPRK People Joyful at Important News
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A decision on awarding the marshalship of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), was announced on Wednesday.
					 All people throughout the country have taken the news as the nation's great auspicious event.
					
					 The radio airs songs reflecting their will to fully display the might of single-minded unity, the foremost strength of Songun (military-first) Korea, rallied closer around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Hyon Ki Chong, a KPA general officer, told KCNA:
					
					 "It was our ardent wish to confer the title of Marshal on the dear respected Kim Jong Un at an earlier date. This desire had run higher after he took the top post of the DPRK leadership.
					
					 From long ago, the servicepersons have respected him as a brilliant commander of varied attainments who is strong in faith, will, courage and grit, prominent in strategy and command and versed in civil and military affairs.
					
					 It is so natural for the servicepersons to devotedly defend Marshal Kim Jong Un, who shows deep loving care for them, trusting in them as his comrades-in-arms.
					
					 The happy news, announced ahead of the War Victory Day, July 27, inspires all the people in building a thriving country with firm confidence in victory."

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Ministry Delegation of Vietnam
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Foreign Ministry Delegation of Vietnam
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the foreign ministry delegation of Vietnam headed by Vice Minister Ho Xuan Son who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday. 
					 The head of the delegation said that the dear respected Kim Jong Un was elected to the top posts of the party and the state.
					
					  He expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries provided by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung would grow stronger in the future.
					
					 He extended congratulations to the Korean people upon great success in their efforts to accomplish the socialist cause under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Foreign Ministry Delegations
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Foreign Ministry Delegations
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun separately met and had talks with the foreign ministry delegation of Vietnam headed by Vice Minister Ho Xuan Son and the foreign ministry delegation of Iran led by Vice-Minister Seyed Abbas Araghchi that paid courtesy calls on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Vietnamese Foreign Ministry Delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Vietnamese Foreign Ministry Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The visiting Foreign Ministry delegation of Vietnam presented a gift to the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by Vice-Minister Ho Xuan Son, head of the delegation, on Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK Friendship Delegation Leaves for China, Laos
articles.content:
DPRK Friendship Delegation Leaves for China, Laos
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A friendship delegation of the General Bureau of the Diplomatic Corps Affairs led by General Director Mun Song Mo left here Wednesday to visit China and Laos.
					 The foreign ministry delegation of Vietnam headed by Vice Minister Ho Xuan Son and the foreign ministry delegation of Iran led by Vice-Minister Seyed Abbas Araghchi left here for home on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Libya Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Libya Appointed
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Hwang Hyong Chol was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Libya, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: Conference of UAWK Held
articles.content:
Conference of UAWK Held 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A conference of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) took place in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Yong Su, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and delegates elected at provincial (municipal) conferences of the UAWK.
					
					 Officials concerned were present there as observers.
					
					 There was discussion on the agenda items on the tasks of the UAWK to hold leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages as the eternal leader of the WPK and revolution and accomplish the Juche cause, Songun revolutionary cause generation after generation under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un and on the revision of the rules of the UAWK. Decisions were made on them.

articles.title: Collection of Music Anecdotes "Mother and Song" Published
articles.content:
Collection of Music Anecdotes "Mother and Song" Published
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A collection of music anecdotes "Mother and Song" was published in the DPRK.
					  The collection contains four parts of 95 anecdotes about anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk who struggled, regarding songs as a mighty treasured sword along with arms of the revolution and an appendix of music of relevant songs.
					
					 The first part "Song of struggle which resounded forth in guerrilla zone" tells anecdotes including stories about the days of enlightening people and leading activities of the art troupe of the Children's Corps through songs reflecting the firm pledge to beat back the Japanese imperialists, landlords and capitalists and embark upon the road of the revolution in her early years.
					
					 The second part "Song of revolution which resounded forth in battles fought against the Japanese troops" deals with unforgettable anecdote about Kim Jong Suk who gave birth to the shining star of Mt. Paektu and brought him up, singing a lullaby, and stories about how she led the guerrillas to the struggle with revolutionary songs in battlefields.
					
					 The third part "Song of building the country that resounded forth in the liberated country" deals with anecdotes about her who made sure  that immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" reverberated throughout the country and led women, working people and students to turn out as one for building a new country with patriotic songs. 
					
					 The fourth part "Immortal song which will last forever" contains anecdotes about how leader Kim Jong Il personally wrote immortal famous masterpieces "My Mother" and "Azalea" and anecdotes about how songs praising Kim Jong Suk became famous songs.

articles.title: Preparations for Arirang Performance Commenced in Real Earnest
articles.content:
Preparations for Arirang Performance Commenced in Real Earnest
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" is now in rehearsal at May Day Stadium in Pyongyang. Training for the performance had been conducted in separate acts and scenes from early May.
					 According to a director of the performance, the rehearsal is helpful to giving shape to the performance contents and harmonizing acts and scenes.
					
					 The creative group introduces new styles into every sector of the performance such as gymnastics, dancing, music, background stand and lighting.
					
					 Choe Chun Hui, an actress of the National Folk Art Troupe, told KCNA:
					
					 "Whenever watching the performance 'Arirang' at the stadium or on TV, I envied its performers. But, now I am one of them.
					
					 I will do my best to improve my artistic ability in dance and contribute to making the performance successful."
					
					 Yu Su Jong, a student at Pyongyang College of Electricity, said:
					
					 "A choreographer as well as my parents would tell me to be good at the performance preparation so as to display the true picture of prosperous DPRK.
					
					 Now I am ready to perform any detailed action. Through the rehearsal, I have come to feel again how strong the teamwork is."
					
					 Kim Hak Jun, a student at Pyongyang Taesin Secondary School, said:
					
					 "At the performance I have to perform heavy gymnastics. At first, I was afraid of performing gymnastics on the bar. But, the help of teachers and classmates made me able to conduct any movement without error. 
					
					 I will show my attractive movements at the forthcoming performance."
					
					 The grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang" now under preparation will represent the 100-year history of victory and glory covered by the Korean people under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. The performance is to begin on Aug. 1.

articles.title: Core, Basic Technologies Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Core, Basic Technologies Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Academy of Agricultural Science in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has paid big efforts to developing and introducing core, basic technologies.
					 Agro-scientists succeeded in intermingling high-yield potato seeds highly immune to disease and virus, with common varieties of seed to establish a system of cultivating disease- and virus-free potato seeds.
					
					 Such technology was applied to the cultivation of fruits, vegetables and industrial crops, too. The technology makes it possible to mass-produce virus-free apple saplings.
					
					 They are also working to apply nano technologies to rice cultivation. Only tens of grams of nano sterilizer are needed to disinfect 100 kilograms of rice seeds.
					
					 Besides, scientists developed software which helps putting farming on a scientific basis.

articles.title: Rainy Season Begins, Typhoon 7 to Hit Korea
articles.content:
Rainy Season Begins, Typhoon 7 to Hit Korea
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A rainy spell has begun in Korea on July 18.
					 There have been heavy rainfalls in most areas of the country, including Pyongyang City, from dawn.
					
					 In particular, downpour hit some areas of South Hwanghae Province. It rained 37 mm in Sinchon County from 06:10 to 07:00, 77 mm in Anak County from 06:20 to 08:20, 50 mm in Unchon County from 06:00 to 09:00 and 31 mm in Ongjin County from 04:45 to 05:30.
					
					 Meanwhile, 420 km-radius typhoon 7 is moving northward from the South Sea of Korea at a velocity of 22 km/h as of 09:00, with its central pressure as 985 hPa, maximum wind speed 25 m/s and wind speed 15 m/s.
					
					 It is expected to come to the waters off Jeju Island at around 15:00 Wednesday and reached at Kanghwa Bay at around 15:00 July 19, before entering the inland of Korea.
					
					 Downpour coupled with over 10m/s wind is forecast from this evening in North and South Hwanghae, South Hamgyong and Kangwon provinces, affected by clouds hovering ahead of the arrival of the typhoon.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Three Principles of National Reunification and North-South Declarations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Preserving Three Principles of National Reunification and North-South Declarations 
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday calls for firmly preserving the principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity and implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration in the movement for national reunification.
					 A bylined article of the paper says:
					
					 Independence is a fundamental principle of the country's reunification that can never be conceded.
					
					 Outside forces, who are working hard to fish in troubled waters by resorting to national division and alienation, can do nothing when all the compatriots maintain independent stand and defend the interests of the nation.
					
					 Peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula are a prerequisite for the country's reunification.
					
					  Different ideologies and social systems that have existed in the north and the south of Korea for a long time can not be a pretext for the use of force. If the north and the south fight with each other, our nation will suffer holocaust and the imperialist aggression forces will get profits. It is necessary to end the acts escalating the military tension on the peninsula and remove the source of a war threatening the peaceful reunification.
					
					 The great national unity is a decisive guarantee for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country. The Korean nation has common national feelings and unanimous desire for the reunification. This will provide a basis for unity.
					
					 Only when the entire nation get united, will it be possible to strengthen the driving forces of the country's reunification. And only when the driving forces of the reunification are strong, can they frustrate the anti-reunification moves of the separatist forces at home and abroad and achieve the country's reunification.
					
					 Lesson showed that the deviation from the principles of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity and denial of the north-south declarations would deteriorate the inter-Korean relations and endanger the nation's destiny.
					
					 The future of the inter-Korean relations and the country's reunification movement entirely depend on how the north-south declarations are preserved and implemented.
					
					 The stand and attitude toward the north-south declarations are a milestone distinguishing reunification from division, unity from confrontation and peace from war.

articles.title: U.S. Attempt to Mark East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea" under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Attempt to Mark East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea" under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Administration recently clarified its official view that it would continue marking the East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea," claiming that it is the U.S. long-standing policy to use one name of anything on maps and publications.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is a sordid act of the U.S. to fish in troubled waters by persistently encouraging Japan in its moves to distort history and stage a comeback to Korea, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The above-said marking was a direct product of the Japanese imperialists' policy of occupation of Korea and their moves for imperialist expansion. Its illegality admits of no argument as their occupation and colonial rule over Korea were of quite illegal and criminal nature.
					
					 To permit this practice is little short of encouraging the Japanese reactionaries in their efforts to realize the ambition for territorial expansion overseas.
					
					 The U.S. has an unavoidable obligation to properly settle the issue of marking the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. insistence on marking the East Sea of Korea as "Japan Sea" cannot be construed otherwise than an act of helping Japan realize the Japanese imperialists' old dream of "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere", a doctrine for expansionism.
					
					 If it was true that the U.S. agreed with Japan's action to change the name of the East Sea of Korea, the inviolable sea of Korea, into "Japan sea" in the last century, taken in by the cunning moves of the Japanese imperialists, it should pay due attention to setting right the wrong history in the sense of repenting of its wrong.
					
					 The U.S. is obliged to fulfill its responsibility and mission in restoring the original name of the East Sea of Korea, the name peculiar to the waters east of the Korean Peninsula, on the principle of impartiality.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Japan's Intention to Interfere in Int'l Disputes
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Japan's Intention to Interfere in Int'l Disputes 
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A commission directly belonging to the prime minister of Japan recently issued a strategic report on Japan's existence in the future in which it underscored the need to allow exercising the right to collective self-defense. 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This tells about Japan's intention to actively intervene in international disputes, not confined to national defense.
					
					 By exercising the right to collective self-defense Japan seeks to acquire the right to take part in a war, in other word, to lay a legal groundwork for realizing its ambition for militarist reinvasion, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Political figures of Japan are now working with their sleeves rolled up to fulfill this political task.
					
					 In June the Japanese defense minister at a meeting of the commission of foreign affairs and defense of the House of Councilors blustered it is necessary for Japan to have capability to attack on enemy bases for defending it from other countries' ballistic missile "attacks," adding striking at enemy bases comes within the scope of "self-defense" in view of international law and interpretation of the Constitution.
					
					 On June 20, the Diet of Japan revised the basic law on atomic energy which had been maintained for 34 years by adding to it the provision that Japan shall use atomic energy for "ensuring state security," thus laying a legal ground for nuclear weaponization and providing a legal guarantee for military activities in space. 
					
					 Japan mulls completely giving up the "Pacifist Constitution" in the future and this issue has become considerably mature in the political circle of Japan. 
					
					 The above-said commission referred to the exercise of the right to collective self-defense in a document concerning the country's future, an indication that the Japanese reactionaries are going to stake Japan's destiny on a war. 
					
					 Japan would be well advised to stop at once the moves for militarist overseas expansion, not oblivious of the lesson taught by its defeat.

articles.title: S. Korea's "2012 White Paper on Diplomacy" under Fire: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
S. Korea's "2012 White Paper on Diplomacy" under Fire: KCNA Commentary
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korean puppet regime published "2012 white paper on diplomacy".
					 In the document it talked nonsense that it has maintained the inter-Korean relations and the stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who are more dead than alive to draw up the document full of lies in order to advertise their foreign policy achievements.
					
					 Such an action is a revelation of the attempt to justify their sycophantic and traitorous anti-reunification and confrontation policy and shift the responsibility for the bedeviled inter-Korean relations on to the DPRK.
					
					 Quite contrary to the contents of the white paper, a touch-and-go situation is prevailing in relations between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					 The serious situation of the peninsula which is arousing serious concerns from the whole Korean nation and the world peace-loving people is the product of the Lee group's sycophantic and traitorous policy from A to Z.
					
					 Upon seizing the power, the Lee group spoke ill of the idea of "By our nation itself" by terming it "exclusive nationalism". The solicitation diplomacy pursued by the puppets crying out for the "cooperation with the international community" precisely means the traitorous diplomacy for confrontation with the compatriots in the DPRK.
					
					 The group has frantically sought to realize the nuclear cooperation against the DPRK while insisting on the "policy toward the north" the keynote of which are the "theory of nuclear threat from the north" and "the theory of urging the north to scrap nuclear program first."
					
					 It set it as a prerequisite for improving the inter-Korean relations to urge the north to scrap the nuclear program first and has sought to force the DPRK to disarm itself. In the meantime, talking about the U.S. offer of a "nuclear umbrella" and the like it begged the U.S. to maximize its nuclear threat to the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Talking about the "contingency" in the DPRK, the group drafted even a war scenario to invade the north and staged such large-scale war drills as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle aimed at preemptive nuclear attack on the north every year in collaboration with foreign forces. It has resorted to the smear campaign against the DPRK over the issue of its "human rights" performance by saying this or that about the idea and social system in the DPRK even in the international arena.
					
					 Early in January last year in particular, the government, political parties and social organizations of the DPRK proposed the south Korean authorities to hold wide-range dialogues and negotiations in order to discuss and settle the crucial issues for the Korean nation. But the group branded it as a "camouflaged peace offensive" and "tactics for united front" to kick up the racket for confrontation, and prevented the inter-Korean high-level military talks proposed by the DPRK from being held.
					
					 The atmosphere for confrontation and danger of war are constantly prevailing on the peninsula due to the treachery of the puppet regime.
					
					 The disgusting sycophantic and pro-U.S. foreign policy of the conservative group has fully reduced south Korea to a colony of the U.S. 
					
					 Claiming that the tightened "alliance" with the U.S. will improve the "prestige" of south Korea and bring benefits to it, the group made no scruple of accepting the wrong demands of the U.S. such as the dispatch of troops to Afghanistan and the sanctions on Iran.
					
					 It concluded the humiliating "Free Trade Agreement" with the U.S., thus seriously threatening the south Koreans' right to existence. Although a large number of people are suffering from untold hardships in their life it has spent a huge amount of funds for the upkeep of the U.S. troops in south Korea.
					
					 Traitor Lee and his group earned an ill fame of colonial servants for their actions for confrontation with fellow countrymen and treason.
					
					 The human scum are foolishly trying to pull themselves out of crimes to prolong their remaining days, but it is too late.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Swiss Internet Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Carried by Swiss Internet Website
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on its Internet homepage the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Shatter Imperialist Moves towards Aggression and War and Safeguard Peace and Independence" on July 10.
					 The work, published on July 3, 1988 clarifies the significance of the World Conference of Journalists and the noble mission and role the world progressive reporters and media persons have assumed. It also deals with the stand of the DPRK government to shatter the imperialists' moves towards aggression and war and safeguard global peace and security.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced in Germany
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced in Germany
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- A lecture with slides introducing the DPRK was given in Thuringen State of Germany on July 7.
					 Present there were figures of different social standings and masses.
					
					 Torsten Schoevitz, vice-chairman of the Communist Party of Germany who visited the DPRK in April, showed slides which deal with the achievements made by the Korean people in building a socialist economy under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the course of the World Congress on the Juche Idea.
					
					 The lecture will be held in different parts of Germany including Brandenburg State and Berlin till September.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Idea and Cause Will Be Everlasting: Foreign Newspapers, Radio
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Idea and Cause Will Be Everlasting: Foreign Newspapers, Radio
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's idea and cause will be everlasting, said foreign newspapers and radio.
					 The Russian paper Patriot Nos. 25 and 26 carried an article titled "Life for people" and several other articles with photos of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 In an article titled "Immortal idea and cause of Comrade Kim Il Sung" the paper praised him as the world political elder and outstanding leader of the international labor movement and the national liberation movement.
					
					 One of the feats he performed is that he founded the great Juche idea and successfully applied it to the Korean revolution. His idea and cause are being given continuity in the DPRK, the article said.
					
					 The Egyptian paper Al-Misaiya on July 10 in an article titled "Shining august name" noted: The august name of the President is throwing its rays as a symbol of the national liberation and the era of independence. He is the great sun who clearly indicated the path of the rebirth and prosperity of the Korean nation. He positively supported the people of different countries in their struggle for national liberation and building of a new society.
					
					 The Radio of Equatorial Guinea on July 7 and 8 reported about his feats on four occasions.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Termed Band of Worst Hooligans
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Termed Band of Worst Hooligans
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and Suneet Chopra, member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist) and secretary general of the All-India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, issued statements on July 12 denouncing the south Korean authorities for their fascist action against Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					 Vishwanath said the Lee Myung Bak fascist authorities let gangsters commit such brutality as arresting and dragging Ro Su Hui like as piece of luggage, adding:
					
					 Ro visited Pyongyang and expressed condolences over the demise of the father of the nation who devoted his whole life to the reunification of the country. This was the fulfillment of his due obligation as a fellow countryman.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group's treatment of the pro-reunification patriot like a criminal and harsh suppression of him glaringly prove that it is, indeed, cruel confrontation maniacs and the worst villains.
					
					 Suneet Chopra branded the suppression of the south Korean pro-reunification patriot as inhuman barbarism and a blatant challenge to the aspiration and desire of the Korean nation for unity and reunification.
					
					 He called upon all the progressive people of the world that love peace and justice to bitterly denounce the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for their fascist actions and moves to escalate the confrontation with the north.

articles.title: Voice of Russia Comments on Scandals of S. Korean Ruling Quarters
articles.content:
Voice of Russia Comments on Scandals of S. Korean Ruling Quarters
						
 Pyongyang, July 18 (KCNA) -- Voice of Russia in a commentary on July 12 dealt with scandals disclosed in an unbroken chain among the ruling quarters of south Korea.
					 Lee Sang Duk, elder brother of Lee Myung Bak, was put in custody by prosecution on charges that he received a fabulous amount of illicit money from different banks and big businesses as bribes, it said, and went on: 
					
					 It is not only Lee Sang Duk but a mafia that were involved in the scandals. Among them were incumbent lawmakers from the ruling party and confidants of the "president".
					
					 They are now being questioned behind bars. 
					
					 The detention of the elder brother of the "president" goes to prove that the bribery is commonplace among the clan of the south Korean "president". The recent case is the second political blow dealt at Lee Myung Bak and his confidants in recent days.
					
					 It was disclosed some days ago that the south Korean "government" attempted to conclude a military agreement with Japan, unknown to the "National Assembly" and the public.
					
					 The conclusion of the General Security of Military Information Agreement with Japan was pushed forward under the strong pressure of the U.S. The agreement calls on south Korea and Japan to exchange information about nuclear and missile activities of the DPRK. These issues are very serious for everyone.
					
					 The disclosure of the bribery case of Lee's elder brother compels Lee to drink a bitter cup of his political defeat with six months before the expiry of the tenure of his office. He will hardly save his face as "president".

articles.title: Concedido titulo de mariscal a Kim Jong Un
articles.content: Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con la resolucion conjunta fechada 17 del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional y el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fue otorgado el titulo de mariscal de la RPDC al Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Acto de juramento de militares del EPC
articles.content:
Acto de juramento de militares del EPC
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto de juramento de los oficiales y los soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea para dar maxima gloria y calurosa felicitacion al Mariscal de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del EPC y apoyar fielmente la direccion de el.
					Participaron en el acto el jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC Choe Ryong Hae, el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC Hyon Yong Chol, el ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares Kim Jong Gak, el primer subjefe de departamento del MINFAP Hyon Chol Hae, los funcionarios directivos del MINFAP y los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae dio lectura a la resolucion del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional y el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, de otorgar el titulo del Mariscal de la RPDC al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Hyon Yong Chol, en su discurso senalo que envia al Comandante Supremo la maxima gloria y la felicitacion mas calurosa con la infinita veneracion y el alma de fidelidad de todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					El otorgamiento del titulo del mariscal de la RPDC a el es una demostracion de infinita veneracion de todo el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea al genial comandante de Songun y sirve de un evento que ostento la firme conviccion y la voluntad de seguir firmemente al Comandante Supremo, subrayo y continuo.
					
					Kim Jong Un, quien tenia relacionado temprano con el fusil bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, considero como mision de toda su vida llevar adelante la causa revolucionaria del Songun, fortalecio el EPC como fuerte ejercito revolucionario y selecto e hizo especial contribucion para glorificar la patria como potencia militar de talla mundial.
					
					Kim Jong Un es el general celebre y genial comandante de acero quien fortalece mas el EPC con la extraordinaria arte de mando militar y demuestra la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso de la potencia del monte Paektu guardando la noble fidelidad a los grandes generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Lograr la reunificacion de la patria y la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche uniendose firmemente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un es la maxima mision y noble deber de los oficiales y soldados del EPC.
					
					Kim Jong Gak, senalo en su discurso que el Comandante Supremo, quien posee en la altura suprema la capacidad y rasgos de militarista y politico contemporaneo, desarrollo y enriquecio mas las autoctonas ideas, estrategias y tacticas militares de grandes generalisimos conforme a la demanda de la epoca con la voluntad de llevar a feliz termino con los fusiles la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el Paektu.
					
					Destaco que gracias a la energica direccion del Comandante Supremo se ha abierto la nueva epoca de auge en el fortalecimiento y el desarrollo del EPC. 
					
					Las vivencias de los oficiales y soldados del EPC les ensenaron la verdad absoluta de que siempre saldra victorioso y glorioso el ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu si sigue la sabia guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Los uniformados del EPC se prepararan como companeros de armas y camaradas revolucionarios que apoyen con conciencia limpia al Comandante Supremo.
					
					Guardando en el alma el patriotismo de            Kim Jong Il, propiciaran innovacion incesante en la edificacion de un Estado prospero y en las obras importantes por el mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y materializaran al frente el proposito del partido de hacer vivir al pueblo en la opulencia socialista.
					
					Pak Jae Gyong dijo que los militares y civiles coreanos pudieron sobreponerse del gran dolor por el deceso de Kim Jong Il y acelerar ahora la marcha solemne hacia la victoria final porque cuentan con el Comandante Supremo, el mejor en la ideologia, la guia y las virtudes humanas.
					
					Otorgarle el maximo titulo militar fue anhelo de todos los uniformados y civiles coreanos, subrayo y prosiguio que ellos estan ahora sumamente jubilosos y contentos por la realizacion de su deseo.
					
					El EPC avanzara ostentando su poderio de ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu en la ofensiva general por la victoria final siguiendo la guia de su Comandante Supremo, finalizo. 
					
					En el acto fue aprobada la resolucion.

articles.title: Festejan con baile otorgamiento de titulo de mariscal a Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Festejan con baile otorgamiento de titulo de mariscal a Kim Jong Un
						
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en la explanada frente a la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el baile de los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea para dedicar la maxima gloria y felicitacion al Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, mariscal de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El acto quedo iniciado con la cancion "Gloria a nuestro gran partido".
					
					Los participantes bailaron al son de varias canciones, entre otras, "Me siento feliz en el regazo del estimado General", "Marcha del Ejercito Popular de Corea", "12 meses de victorias del Songun" y "Mi patria que defiendo", reflejando en sus movimientos la confianza en su Comandante Supremo.
					
					En sus rostros se denotaba el orgullo de haber enaltecido en el cargo cimero de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias a ese gran hombre sin par que hizo gran aporte al fortalecimiento y desarrollo de esas fuerzas de Corea al profundizar incesantemente la autoctona idea, estrategia y tactica militares y los metodos de combate del Juche de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Cuando repercutian las canciones "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General Kim Jong Un", "Pasos" y "Nos veremos en el frente", ellos danzaron con la decision de cumplir la mision y el deber sagrados de ejercito del partido, el lider y el Comandante Supremo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion vietnamita
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con la delegacion vietnamita
						
Pyongyang, 18 de julio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, converso el dia 18 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con la delegacion del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, presidida por su viceministro Ho Xuan Son, que le hizo una visita de cortesia. 
					Las conversaciones transcurrieron en una atmosfera amistosa.
					
					En la ocasion, el huesped se refirio a la eleccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un en el maximo puesto del partido y el Estado.
					
					Expreso su conviccion de que se desarrollen y se fortalezcan tambien en el futuro las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises preparadas por el presidente Ho Chi Minh y el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Felicito lo que bajo la destacada direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un, el pueblo coreano logra grandes exitos en la lucha por llevar a termino la causa socialista.
